title: IoT Towers of Resilience
abstract: This paper presents a novel IoT-based architecture for building resilient smart city infrastructure. We propose a distributed sensor network that can withstand various environmental challenges while maintaining connectivity and data integrity.

title: Harnessing Technology for Climate Resilience (Eco-friendly Cooler)
abstract: An innovative eco-friendly cooling system that leverages renewable energy sources and advanced materials to provide sustainable temperature control solutions.

title: Early Detection of Lung Cancer using PVT v2
abstract: A deep learning approach using Pyramid Vision Transformer v2 for early lung cancer detection from chest X-rays, achieving state-of-the-art accuracy in medical image analysis.

title: Multi-Model AI-Driven Satellite Segmentation (Best Session Paper)
abstract: Winner of Best Session Paper award. This work presents a multi-model ensemble approach for satellite image segmentation with applications in urban planning and environmental monitoring.

title: Optimizing Multimodal Transformers for Medical Image Captioning
abstract: Advanced transformer architectures optimized for generating natural language descriptions of medical images, improving clinical workflow and diagnosis support.

title: Multi-Model AI for Satellite Urban Development
abstract: AI-powered analysis of satellite imagery for monitoring and predicting urban development patterns, supporting sustainable city planning initiatives.

title: CarKoto: AI for Used Car Price Prediction in Bangladesh
abstract: A machine learning system specifically designed for the Bangladesh automotive market, providing accurate used car price predictions using local market dynamics and vehicle characteristics.

title: MedDose: AI + IoT Medication Compliance System
abstract: An integrated AI and IoT system for monitoring and improving medication compliance, featuring smart dispensers and personalized reminder systems.

title: AI for Real-Time Sign Language Detection & Translation
abstract: Real-time computer vision system for sign language recognition and translation, promoting accessibility and inclusion in digital communications.

title: DSFP: Layerwise DCNN Pruning
abstract: A novel approach to deep convolutional neural network pruning that maintains performance while significantly reducing model size and computational requirements.

title: Defending Against Evasion Attacks in ML
abstract: Comprehensive study of evasion attacks on machine learning models with novel defense mechanisms to improve model robustness and security.

title: CerevianNet: Lightweight CNN for Brain Tumor Classification
abstract: A lightweight convolutional neural network architecture specifically designed for brain tumor classification from MRI images, balancing accuracy with computational efficiency.

title: Intelligent Systems in Neuroimaging
abstract: Comprehensive review and novel approaches to intelligent systems in neuroimaging, covering recent advances in AI applications for brain research.

title: Fine-tuned Transformer Models for Breast Cancer Detection
abstract: Advanced transformer architectures fine-tuned for breast cancer detection from mammography images, achieving high sensitivity and specificity rates.

title: HybiNet: Multi-Model Fusion for Chest X-rays
abstract: A hybrid neural network architecture that fuses multiple deep learning models for comprehensive chest X-ray analysis and diagnosis support.
